snippet: A focus on health-care education in Texas may result in a new four-year medical school, but both sophisticated Austin and the poverty-stricken Rio Grande Valley want it.
lead_paragraph: A focus on health-care education in Texas may result in a new four-year medical school, but both sophisticated Austin and the poverty-stricken Rio Grande Valley want it.

headline.seo: Austin and Rio Grande Valley Both Want Texas’ Next Four-Year Medical School
